body.draft-comment: This topic will describe how Webhelp templates works.

draft-comment.author: webapp
draft-comment.b: Create a special/separate index.html page for responsive webhelp

body.p: A Webhelp template consist of a set of HTML template pages, components and other additional resources like images, CSS or JavaScript. Each HTML template file contains one or more template components that will be expanded at runtime.
This allows you to create multiple layouts only by changing the place where the components where be visible or by changing their visibility.
The next topics describe which are the template pages, template components and template directory structure.
